name: miniUR
description:
The Royal game of Ur.

You roll 4 dice, each die can be 0 or 1.
Click the names to change from HUMAN to the Bots, try to figure out their AI. Their names are hints.

Mouse control.

Rules:
The course goes; up, into the middle, down, to your side, then up and out.
Green tiles are rerolls.
The middle green tile is safe - meaning you can't kill the enemy here, and vice versa.
You need to roll a perfect roll to escape.

F1 = Show kill count.
F2 = Show dice rolls.
F4 = Change resolution.

Hobby project. Bugs probably exist.

No sounds or music.

Made in GameMaker 1.4.
